main event: An unknown object was detected on radar during heavy thunderstorm activity in Kansas City, Missouri on May 10, 1962.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 4 minutes,The radar reported an unknown track at an altitude of 5,000-10,000 feet,The observer was unable to make visual contact due to heavy storm clouds,The object was moving on a course of 000 degrees,The nature of the object remains classified as unidentified pending further information.
witness description: data derived from radar observation during a thunderstorm
